verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went רְחַבְעָ֖ם <S%H7346><s%> re-chav-'Am And Rehoboam שְׁכֶ֑מָה <S%H7927><s%> she-Che-mah; to Shechem כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שְׁכֶ֛ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem for to Shechem בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u come כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol for all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El were all Israel לְהַמְלִ֥יךְ <S%H4427><s%> le-ham-Lich to make him king אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כִּשְׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> kish-Mo-a' heard יָרָבְעָ֤ם <S%H3379><s%> ya-ra-ve-'Am And it came to pass when Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נְבָט֙ <S%H5028><s%> ne-Vat of Nebat וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he בְמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> ve-mitz-Ra-yim, who [was] in Egypt אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher where בָּרַ֔ח <S%H1272><s%> ba-Rach, whither he had fled מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from the presence שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh of Solomon הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; the king וַיָּ֥שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov returned יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> ya-ra-ve-'Am [it] that Jeroboam מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. out of Egypt

וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-le-Chu And they sent וַיִּקְרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-re-'u- and called ל֔וֹ lo, וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> ya-ra-ve-'Am him So Jeroboam וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; and all Israel וַֽיְדַבְּר֔וּ <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-be-Ru, and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to רְחַבְעָ֖ם <S%H7346><s%> re-chav-'Am to Rehoboam לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha Thy father הִקְשָׁ֣ה <S%H7185><s%> hik-Shah grievous אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֻלֵּ֑נוּ <S%H5923><s%> 'ul-Le-nu; made our yoke וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now הָקֵל֩ <S%H7043><s%> ha-Kel now therefore ease מֵעֲבֹדַ֨ת <S%H5656><s%> me-'a-vo-Dat servitude אָבִ֜יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha of thy father הַקָּשָׁ֗ה <S%H7186><s%> hak-ka-Shah, thou somewhat the grievous וּמֵעֻלּ֧וֹ <S%H5923><s%> u-me-'ul-Lo yoke הַכָּבֵ֛ד <S%H3515><s%> hak-ka-Ved and his heavy אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan that he put עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu on וְנַֽעַבְדֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H5647><s%> ve-Na-'av-De-ka. upon us and we will serve

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to me ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet unto me after three יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days וְשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shu-vu unto them Come again אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; about וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech departed הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. And the people ס sa-Mek

וַיִּוָּעַ֞ץ <S%H3289><s%> vai-yiv-va-'Atz took counsel הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech And king רְחַבְעָ֗ם <S%H7346><s%> re-chav-'Am, Rehoboam אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with הַזְּקֵנִים֙ <S%H2205><s%> haz-ze-ke-Nim with the old אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu had עֹֽמְדִ֗ים <S%H5975><s%> 'o-me-Dim, men that had stood לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh Solomon אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv, his father בִּֽהְיֹת֥וֹ <S%H1961><s%> bih-yo-To had חַ֖י <S%H2416><s%> chai while he yet lived לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> 'eich What אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you נֽוֹעָצִ֔ים <S%H3289><s%> no-'a-Tzim, counsel give לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> le-ha-Shiv ye [me] to return לָֽעָם־ <S%H5971><s%> la-'om- folk הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> da-Var. answer

וַיְדַבְּר֨וּ <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-be-Ru And they spake אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, unto him saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If תִּֽהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become לְט֜וֹב <S%H2896><s%> le-Tov If thou be kind לְהָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> le-ha-'Am to this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh to this וּרְצִיתָ֔ם <S%H7521><s%> u-re-tzi-Tam, and please וְדִבַּרְתָּ֥ <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-bar-Ta them and speak אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem about דְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rim words טוֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> to-Vim; good וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become לְךָ֛ le-Cha עֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim to them they will be thy servants כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim. for ever

וַֽיַּעֲזֹ֛ב <S%H5800><s%> vai-ya-'a-Zo But he forsook אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲצַ֥ת <S%H6098><s%> 'a-Tzat the counsel הַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> haz-ze-ke-Nim which the old men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְעָצֻ֑הוּ <S%H3289><s%> ye-'a-Tzu-hu; gave וַיִּוָּעַ֗ץ <S%H3289><s%> vai-yiv-va-'Atz, him and took counsel אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with הַיְלָדִים֙ <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim with the young men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who גָּדְל֣וּ <S%H1431><s%> ga-de-Lu that were brought up אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, that הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> ha-'o-me-Dim with him that stood לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav. before

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to מָ֚ה <S%H4100><s%> mah What אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you נֽוֹעָצִ֔ים <S%H3289><s%> no-'a-Tzim, unto them What advice וְנָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> ve-na-Shiv give ye that we may return דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var answer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am to this people הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who דִּבְּר֤וּ <S%H1696><s%> dib-be-Ru which have spoken אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, to me saying הָקֵל֙ <S%H7043><s%> ha-Kel Ease מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הָעֹ֔ל <S%H5923><s%> ha-'Ol, somewhat the yoke אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan did put אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha that thy father עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu. him

וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-be-Ru with him spake אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, for הַיְלָדִים֙ <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim And the young men אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who גָּדְל֣וּ <S%H1431><s%> ga-de-Lu that were brought up אִתּוֹ֮ <S%H854><s%> it-To to him לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor unto him saying כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus תֹאמַ֡ר <S%H559><s%> to-Mar Thus shalt thou answer לָעָם֩ <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who דִּבְּר֨וּ <S%H1696><s%> dib-be-Ru that spake אֵלֶ֜יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, unto thee saying אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha Thy father הִכְבִּ֣יד <S%H3513><s%> hich-Bid heavy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֻלֵּ֔נוּ <S%H5923><s%> 'ul-Le-nu, our yoke וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you הָקֵ֣ל <S%H7043><s%> ha-Kel but make thou [it] somewhat lighter מֵעָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lei-nu; and כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus תֹּאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> to-Mar for us thus shalt thou say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to קָֽטָנִּ֥י <S%H6995><s%> ka-tan-Ni unto them My little עָבָ֖ה <S%H5666><s%> 'a-Vah [finger] shall be thicker מִמָּתְנֵ֥י <S%H4975><s%> mi-ma-te-Nei loins אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi. than my father's

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, For whereas אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi my father הֶעְמִ֤יס <S%H6006><s%> he'-Mis put עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem and עֹ֣ל <S%H5923><s%> 'ol yoke כָּבֵ֔ד <S%H3515><s%> ka-Ved, a heavy וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> 'o-Sif upon you I will put more עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto עֻלְּכֶ֑ם <S%H5923><s%> 'ul-le-Chem; to your yoke אָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi, my father יִסַּ֤ר <S%H3256><s%> yis-Sar chastised אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem בַּשּׁוֹטִ֔ים <S%H7752><s%> bash-sho-Tim, you with whips וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I בָּֽעֲקְרַבִּֽים׃ <S%H6137><s%> Ba-'ak-rab-Bim. but I [will chastise you] with scorpions ס sa-Mek

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came יָרָבְעָ֧ם <S%H3379><s%> ya-ra-ve-'Am So Jeroboam וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and all the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to רְחַבְעָ֖ם <S%H7346><s%> re-chav-'Am to Rehoboam בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi; on the third כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber bade הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech as the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying שׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Shu-vu Come again אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi. to me on the third

וַיַּעֲנֵ֥ם <S%H6030><s%> vai-ya-'a-Nem answered הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech And the king קָשָׁ֑ה <S%H7186><s%> ka-Shah; them roughly וַֽיַּעֲזֹב֙ <S%H5800><s%> vai-ya-'a-Zo forsook הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech and king רְחַבְעָ֔ם <S%H7346><s%> re-chav-'Am, Rehoboam אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et עֲצַ֥ת <S%H6098><s%> 'a-Tzat the counsel הַזְּקֵנִֽים׃ <S%H2205><s%> haz-ze-ke-Nim. of the old men

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber And answered אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to כַּעֲצַ֤ת <S%H6098><s%> ka-'a-Tzat them after the advice הַיְלָדִים֙ <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim of the young men לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying אַכְבִּיד֙ <S%H3513><s%> 'ach-Bid heavy אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֻלְּכֶ֔ם <S%H5923><s%> 'ul-le-Chem, made your yoke וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> 'o-Sif but I will add עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav; and אָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi, My father יִסַּ֤ר <S%H3256><s%> yis-Sar chastised אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem בַּשּׁוֹטִ֔ים <S%H7752><s%> bash-sho-Tim, you with whips וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I בָּעֲקְרַבִּֽים׃ <S%H6137><s%> ba-'ak-rab-Bim. but I [will chastise you] with scorpions

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma' hearkened הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech So the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; not unto the people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah it was נְסִבָּה֙ <S%H5252><s%> ne-sib-Bah for the cause מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im from הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, was of God לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> le-ma-'An might הָקִ֨ים <S%H6965><s%> ha-Kim might perform יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דְּבָר֗וֹ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Ro, his word אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber which he spake בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad by the hand אֲחִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H281><s%> 'a-chi-Ya-hu of Ahijah הַשִּֽׁלוֹנִ֔י <S%H7888><s%> hash-shi-lo-Ni, the Shilonite אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> ya-ra-ve-'Am to Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נְבָֽט׃ <S%H5028><s%> ne-Vat. of Nebat
